The Raiders produced a stirring comeback to force golden point against the Eels but Ricky Stuart wasn't overly impressed with what he witnessed from last year's runners-up.

articles.title: Round 7 charges: Ofahengaue faces three-game ban; RTS in strife - NRL.COM
articles.description: All the official charges for Round 7 of the Telstra Premiership.
articles.content:
Things have gone from bad to worse for Brisbane with Maroons forward Joe Ofahengaue staring down the barrel of a three-game ban for a shoulder charge.
